title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the dialog, the following issues were observed:
i. Duplicated name validation is not performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second column in the dialog are not properly merged.

The expected behavior is as follows:

a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.

b. The table should have a label so it can be assigned a mnemonic.

c. Multiple selection should be allowed in the list, as move up / down functionality can be applied to more than one item.

d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps text. It would be nice if the signature preview has the same background color as a hover effect.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the dialog to modify parameters.
2. Try changing a parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
OB:
Duplicated name validation is not performed on the first page.
The first and second column in the dialog are not properly merged.
EB:

Multiple selection should be allowed in the list, as move up / down functionality can be applied to more than one item.
The signature preview must be a label that wraps text. It would be nice if the signature preview has the same background color as a hover effect.
